column5: Private Garage apartment!! We live in a quiet South Austin neighborhood with easy access to major roads (2 miles to I-35 or 290/71) and less than a block to #311 bus or 0.5 mile to #7 bus. We are 6 miles from downtown.   Garage apartment is SMALL but completely PRIVATE and includes: Bathroom Living: Futon, also kitchenette (sink, fridge, microwave, keurig, dishes) Bedroom 1: Queen bed Bedroom 2: Full bed, Twin bed
column8: Private Apt! Affordable. Close to Airport & DT
